text: I’ll never be able to achieve my goals. I always fail at everything I try. It’s just the way things are for me, no matter how hard I try.
If I don’t get that promotion, my career will be over. I can’t handle that kind of failure, and I’m sure they’ll think I’m incompetent.
I saw a negative comment on my post, so now I’m sure that everyone hates me and thinks I’m terrible. No one could possibly like what I’m doing.
